data.title: HELLO! Magazine Issue 828 Hugh Grant & Jemima Khan, Marie Helvin, Yanna Avis (August 10, 2004)
data.meta_description: ‘SUMMER LOVING’ COVER + 28-PAGE SUMMER SPECIAL HOLIDAY PULLOUT (New Condition) HUGH GRANT & JEMIMA KHAN The truth about their relationship  (7 pages) YANNA AVIS, with husband WARREN the rent-a-car millionaire, at their stunning retreat …
data.text:
Description

‘SUMMER LOVING’ COVER + 28-PAGE SUMMER SPECIAL HOLIDAY PULLOUT

(New Condition)

HUGH GRANT & JEMIMA KHAN The truth about their relationship (7 pages)

YANNA AVIS, with husband WARREN the rent-a-car millionaire, at their stunning retreat in Acapulco (9)

JOHN GORDON SINCLAIR Weds SHAUNA McKEON in Glasgow (2)

MARIE HELVIN at her new home in Chelsea reveals the secrets of her youthful beauty … (5)

JUSTIN TIMBERLAKE & CAMERON DIAZ hit back at infidelity rumours (2)

OLIVIER MARTINEZ with co-star MICHELLE RODRIGUEZ in St. Tropez (2)

PRINCE HARRY, CARLO CARELLO, PRINCESS BEATRICE Party at the Polo (2)

PRINCE WILLIAM & KATE (2)

MICHELLE COLLINS on her remarkable trip to Armenia (6)

PRINCE FREDERIK of Denmark & PRINCESS MARY meet the people (2)

CATHERINE ZETA JONES Stalker nightmare! (2)

LANCE ARMSTRONG & SHERYL CROW – The happy couple in Paris (2)

CYNTHIA NIXON comes clean about life after the ‘Sex and the City’ hit show (3)

WAYNE ROONEY scandal puts strain on his relationship with fiancée COLEEN McLOUGHLIN (2)

BRITNEY SPEARS prepares for married life with KEVIN FEDERLINE (2)

LADY DAVINA WINDSOR’S ‘unlikely Royal romance with Maori builder GARY LEWIS’ (2)

MERYL STREEP the Oscar-winning actress on her most important role … (3)

DEENA PAYNE ‘Emmerdale’s Viv Hope, on surviving her dramatic on-set breakdown – with her partner STEVE GRANT & son WILLIAM (4)

JAMES CRACKNELL, Olympic Rowing Champion tells of his hopes for Athens (2)

AMICI FOREVER the record-breaking opera band (3)

MARIA LEON models ‘Prints by the Italian Masters’ (4)

UMA THURMAN & ANDRE BALAZS – DAVID BECKHAM – DAVID BOWIE – NAOMI CAMPBELL
